oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Jimmie Rodgers Memorial Day - 1953-05-26 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of a WSM program featuring recordings of speeches and performances from the Jimmie Rodgers Memorial Day celebration, held in Meridian, Mississippi on May 5, 1953. Program announcer is Grant Turner. Features recordings of speeches by Bill Bruner, A. P. Carter, Nelson King, Hank Snow, Jimmie Davis, Carrie Rodgers, and Elsie McWilliams; and performances by Hank Snow, Jimmie Rodgers Snow, Charlie Walker, Bill Bruner and The Carter Family.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Charlie Walker
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hank Snow introduces Carrie Rodgers -- Carrie Rodgers talks -- Carrie Rodgers introduces Anita Rodgers -- Anita Rodgers talks -- Carrie Rodgers introduces Conrad "Sonny" Rodgers -- Carrie Rodgers introduces Little Jimmie Rodgers -- Hank Snow talks -- Hank Snow introduces Jimmie Rodgers Snow and Justin Tubb -- Grant Turner talks (incomplete) -- Grant Turner introduces Charlie Walker -- Blue Yodel No. 1 (Charlie Walker) -- Grant Turner talks (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Rodgers, Jimmie, 1897-1933; Snow, Hank; Snow, Jimmie Rodgers; Davis, Jimmie, 1899-2000; Rodgers, Carrie; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Tubb, Justin; Hill, Eddie, 1921-1994; Carter Family (Musical group); Carter, A. P. (Alvin Pleasant), 1891-1960; McWilliams, Elsie, 1896-1985; King, Nelson; Bruner, Bill;
